000266  3021              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x21
000268  f7fffffe          BL       __2sprintf
;;;1391               TEXT_SetText(hItem,buf);
00026c  491a              LDR      r1,|L3.728|
00026e  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000270  3121              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x21
000272  f7fffffe          BL       TEXT_SetText
;;;1392               code8 = num;
000276  7374              STRB     r4,[r6,#0xd]
;;;1393               Write_info();
000278  e8bd4070          POP      {r4-r6,lr}
00027c  f7ffbffe          B.W      Write_info
                  |L3.640|
;;;1394               break;
;;;1395           }
;;;1396           case set_62:
;;;1397           {
;;;1398               hItem = WM_GetDialogItem(hWinsysinfo, ID_TEXT_113);
000280  f6403108          MOV      r1,#0xb08
000284  f7fffffe          BL       WM_GetDialogItem
000288  4605              MOV      r5,r0
;;;1399               sprintf(buf,"%d",num);
00028a  4813              LDR      r0,|L3.728|
00028c  4622              MOV      r2,r4
00028e  a113              ADR      r1,|L3.732|
000290  3021              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x21
000292  f7fffffe          BL       __2sprintf
;;;1400               TEXT_SetText(hItem,buf);
000296  4910              LDR      r1,|L3.728|
000298  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00029a  3121              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x21
00029c  f7fffffe          BL       TEXT_SetText
;;;1401               code1 = num;
0002a0  71b4              STRB     r4,[r6,#6]
;;;1402               Write_info();
0002a2  e8bd4070          POP      {r4-r6,lr}
0002a6  f7ffbffe          B.W      Write_info
                  |L3.682|
;;;1403               break;
;;;1404           }
;;;1405           case set_63:
;;;1406           {
;;;1407               hItem = WM_GetDialogItem(hWinsysinfo, ID_TEXT_114);
0002aa  f6403109          MOV      r1,#0xb09
0002ae  f7fffffe          BL       WM_GetDialogItem
0002b2  4605              MOV      r5,r0
;;;1408               sprintf(buf,"%d",num);
0002b4  4808              LDR      r0,|L3.728|
0002b6  4622              MOV      r2,r4
0002b8  a108              ADR      r1,|L3.732|
0002ba  3021              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x21
0002bc  f7fffffe          BL       __2sprintf
;;;1409               TEXT_SetText(hItem,buf);
0002c0  4905              LDR      r1,|L3.728|
0002c2  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0002c4  3121              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x21
0002c6  f7fffffe          BL       TEXT_SetText
;;;1410               code2 = num;
0002ca  71f4              STRB     r4,[r6,#7]
;;;1411               Write_info();
0002cc  e8bd4070          POP      {r4-r6,lr}
0002d0  f7ffbffe          B.W      Write_info
                  |L3.724|
;;;1412               break;
;;;1413           }
;;;1414           
;;;1415       }
;;;1416   }
0002d4  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1417   
                          ENDP

0002d6  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L3.728|
                          DCD      ||.data||
                  |L3.732|
0002dc  256400            DCB      "%d",0
0002df  00                DCB      0

                          AREA ||i.Rlow_cal||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  Rlow_cal PROC
;;;1434   
;;;1435   void Rlow_cal(u8 step)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1436   {
;;;1437       if(step == 1)
;;;1438       {
;;;1439           Modify_A_READ = Rmon_value;//测量电压值
000002  4b25              LDR      r3,|L4.152|
000004  4a25              LDR      r2,|L4.156|
;;;1440   		Modify_A_ACT = 0x0A;//读取低段
000006  4926              LDR      r1,|L4.160|
000008  2801              CMP      r0,#1                 ;1437
00000a  d029              BEQ      |L4.96|
;;;1441       }else if(step == 2){
00000c  2802              CMP      r0,#2
00000e  d12b              BNE      |L4.104|
;;;1442           vu16 var16;
;;;1443           vu32 var32a;
;;;1444           vu32 var32b;
;;;1445           
;;;1446           vu16 var16a;
;;;1447           vu32 var32c;
;;;1448           vu32 var32d;
;;;1449           Modify_B_READ =Rmon_value;//测量电压值
000010  8818              LDRH     r0,[r3,#0]  ; Rmon_value
000012  4b24              LDR      r3,|L4.164|
000014  8018              STRH     r0,[r3,#0]
;;;1450           flag_OverV=1;
000016  4c24              LDR      r4,|L4.168|
000018  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; flagG
00001a  f0400002          ORR      r0,r0,#2
00001e  6020              STR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; flagG
;;;1451           Modify_B_ACT = 0x64;//读取高段
000020  4d22              LDR      r5,|L4.172|
000022  2664              MOVS     r6,#0x64
000024  802e              STRH     r6,[r5,#0]
;;;1452           if(flag_OverV==1)//只有当有数据写入时才能将校准数据写入FLASH
000026  0780              LSLS     r0,r0,#30
000028  d530              BPL      |L4.140|
;;;1453           {
;;;1454               var32a = Modify_B_ACT;
00002a  8828              LDRH     r0,[r5,#0]  ; Modify_B_ACT
;;;1455               var32a = var32a - Modify_A_ACT;
00002c  8809              LDRH     r1,[r1,#0]  ; Modify_A_ACT
00002e  1a40              SUBS     r0,r0,r1
;;;1456               var32a = var32a << 12;
000030  0301              LSLS     r1,r0,#12
;;;1457               var16 = Modify_B_READ - Modify_A_READ;
000032  8818              LDRH     r0,[r3,#0]  ; Modify_B_READ
000034  8812              LDRH     r2,[r2,#0]  ; Modify_A_READ
000036  1a80              SUBS     r0,r0,r2
000038  b280              UXTH     r0,r0
;;;1458               var32a = var32a / var16;
00003a  fbb1f0f0          UDIV     r0,r1,r0
;;;1459               REG_CorrectionR = var32a;
00003e  4a1c              LDR      r2,|L4.176|
000040  80d0              STRH     r0,[r2,#6]
;;;1460               var32a=0;
;;;1461               var32a = Modify_B_ACT;
000042  8828              LDRH     r0,[r5,#0]  ; Modify_B_ACT
;;;1462               var32a = var32a << 12;
000044  0301              LSLS     r1,r0,#12
;;;1463               var32b = Modify_B_READ;
000046  881b              LDRH     r3,[r3,#0]  ; Modify_B_READ
;;;1464               var32b = var32b * REG_CorrectionR;
000048  88d0              LDRH     r0,[r2,#6]  ; Correct_Parametet
00004a  4358              MULS     r0,r3,r0
;;;1465               if (var32a < var32b)
;;;1466               {
;;;1467                   var32b = var32b - var32a;
;;;1468                   REG_ReadR_Offset = var32b;
00004c  4b19              LDR      r3,|L4.180|
00004e  4281              CMP      r1,r0                 ;1465
000050  d20b              BCS      |L4.106|
000052  1a40              SUBS     r0,r0,r1              ;1467
000054  60d8              STR      r0,[r3,#0xc]  ; Correct_Strong
;;;1469                   Polar3 |= 0x01;
000056  8ad0              LDRH     r0,[r2,#0x16]  ; Correct_Parametet
000058  f0400001          ORR      r0,r0,#1
00005c  82d0              STRH     r0,[r2,#0x16]
00005e  e00a              B        |L4.118|
                  |L4.96|
000060  8818              LDRH     r0,[r3,#0]            ;1439  ; Rmon_value
000062  8010              STRH     r0,[r2,#0]            ;1439
000064  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa               ;1440
000066  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]            ;1440
                  |L4.104|
;;;1470               }
;;;1471               else 
;;;1472               {
;;;1473                   var32a = var32a - var32b;
;;;1474                   REG_ReadR_Offset = var32a;
;;;1475                   Polar3 &= ~0x01;
;;;1476               }
;;;1477   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------//
;;;1478               Flash_Write_all();	//参数写进FLASH
;;;1479               flag_OverV=0;
;;;1480               Flag_DAC_OFF=0;
;;;1481           }
;;;1482           flag_ADJ_VH=0;//清掉标志位防止一直进入
;;;1483       }
;;;1484   }
000068  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L4.106|
00006a  1a08              SUBS     r0,r1,r0              ;1473
00006c  60d8              STR      r0,[r3,#0xc]          ;1474  ; Correct_Strong
00006e  8ad0              LDRH     r0,[r2,#0x16]         ;1475  ; Correct_Parametet
000070  f0200001          BIC      r0,r0,#1              ;1475
000074  82d0              STRH     r0,[r2,#0x16]         ;1475
                  |L4.118|
000076  f7fffffe          BL       Flash_Write_all
00007a  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]            ;1479  ; flagG
00007c  f0200002          BIC      r0,r0,#2              ;1479
000080  6020              STR      r0,[r4,#0]            ;1479  ; flagG
000082  480d              LDR      r0,|L4.184|
000084  6801              LDR      r1,[r0,#0]            ;1480  ; flagB
000086  f0210108          BIC      r1,r1,#8              ;1480
00008a  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]            ;1480  ; flagB
                  |L4.140|
00008c  480b              LDR      r0,|L4.188|
00008e  6801              LDR      r1,[r0,#0]            ;1482  ; flagF
000090  f0210108          BIC      r1,r1,#8              ;1482
000094  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]            ;1482  ; flagF
000096  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                          ENDP

                  |L4.152|
                          DCD      Rmon_value
                  |L4.156|
                          DCD      Modify_A_READ
                  |L4.160|
                          DCD      Modify_A_ACT
                  |L4.164|
                          DCD      Modify_B_READ
                  |L4.168|
                          DCD      flagG
                  |L4.172|
                          DCD      Modify_B_ACT
                  |L4.176|
                          DCD      Correct_Parametet
                  |L4.180|
                          DCD      Correct_Strong
                  |L4.184|
                          DCD      flagB
                  |L4.188|
                          DCD      flagF

                          AREA ||i.SYS_INFO_DOWN||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  SYS_INFO_DOWN PROC
;;;1045   void SYS_INFO_DOWN(void);
;;;1046   void SYS_INFO_DOWN(void)

;;;1063           }
;;;1064           case set_49:

;;;1066               hItem = WM_GetDialogItem(hWinsysinfo, ID_TEXT_100);

;;;1253               TEXT_SetBkColor(hItem,0x00BFFFFF);
;;;1254               TEXT_SetTextColor(hItem, GUI_BLACK);
;;;1255               
;;;1256               info_set = set_48;
;;;1257               break;
;;;1258           }
;;;1259       }
;;;1260       
;;;1261   }

                          AREA ||i.SYS_INFO_LEFT||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  SYS_INFO_LEFT PROC
;;;607    void SYS_INFO_LEFT(void);
;;;608    void SYS_INFO_LEFT(void)
000000  e92d5ff0          PUSH     {r4-r12,lr}
;;;609    {
;;;610        WM_HWIN hItem;
;;;611        switch(info_set)
000004  48fc              LDR      r0,|L6.1016|
000006  7801              LDRB     r1,[r0,#0]  ; info_set
;;;612        {
;;;613            case set_48:
;;;614            {
;;;615                hItem = WM_GetDialogItem(hWinsysinfo, ID_TEXT_99);
000008  f6400699          MOV      r6,#0x899
00000c  392f              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x2f           ;611
;;;616                TEXT_SetBkColor(hItem,GUI_INVALID_COLOR);
;;;617                TEXT_SetTextColor(hItem, 0x00BFFFFF);
00000e  4dfb              LDR      r5,|L6.1020|
;;;618                
;;;619                hItem = WM_GetDialogItem(hWinsysinfo, ID_TEXT_106);
;;;620                TEXT_SetBkColor(hItem,0x00BFFFFF);
;;;621                TEXT_SetTextColor(hItem, GUI_BLACK);
;;;622                
;;;623                info_set = set_55;
;;;624                break;
;;;625            }
;;;626            case set_49:
;;;627            {
;;;628                hItem = WM_GetDialogItem(hWinsysinfo, ID_TEXT_100);
000010  1c77              ADDS     r7,r6,#1
;;;629                TEXT_SetBkColor(hItem,GUI_INVALID_COLOR);
;;;630                TEXT_SetTextColor(hItem, 0x00BFFFFF);
;;;631                
;;;632                hItem = WM_GetDialogItem(hWinsysinfo, ID_TEXT_99);
;;;633                TEXT_SetBkColor(hItem,0x00BFFFFF);
;;;634                TEXT_SetTextColor(hItem, GUI_BLACK);
;;;635                
;;;636                info_set = set_48;
;;;637                break;
;;;638            }
;;;639            case set_50:
;;;640            {
;;;641                hItem = WM_GetDialogItem(hWinsysinfo, ID_TEXT_101);
;;;642                TEXT_SetBkColor(hItem,GUI_INVALID_COLOR);
;;;643                TEXT_SetTextColor(hItem, 0x00BFFFFF);
;;;644                
;;;645                hItem = WM_GetDialogItem(hWinsysinfo, ID_TEXT_100);
;;;646                TEXT_SetBkColor(hItem,0x00BFFFFF);
;;;647                TEXT_SetTextColor(hItem, GUI_BLACK);
;;;648                
;;;649                info_set = set_49;
;;;650                break;
;;;651            }
;;;652            case set_51:
;;;653            {
;;;654                hItem = WM_GetDialogItem(hWinsysinfo, ID_TEXT_102);
;;;655                TEXT_SetBkColor(hItem,GUI_INVALID_COLOR);
;;;656                TEXT_SetTextColor(hItem, 0x00BFFFFF);
;;;657                
;;;658                hItem = WM_GetDialogItem(hWinsysinfo, ID_TEXT_101);
;;;659                TEXT_SetBkColor(hItem,0x00BFFFFF);
;;;660                TEXT_SetTextColor(hItem, GUI_BLACK);
;;;661                
;;;662                info_set = set_50;
;;;663                break;
;;;664            }
;;;665            case set_52:
;;;666            {
;;;667                hItem = WM_GetDialogItem(hWinsysinfo, ID_TEXT_103);
000012  1d34              ADDS     r4,r6,#4
000014  6980              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x18]         ;615
000016  f640089b          MOV      r8,#0x89b             ;641
00001a  f640099c          MOV      r9,#0x89c             ;654
;;;668                TEXT_SetBkColor(hItem,GUI_INVALID_COLOR);
;;;669                TEXT_SetTextColor(hItem, 0x00BFFFFF);
;;;670                
;;;671                hItem = WM_GetDialogItem(hWinsysinfo, ID_TEXT_102);
;;;672                TEXT_SetBkColor(hItem,0x00BFFFFF);
;;;673                TEXT_SetTextColor(hItem, GUI_BLACK);
;;;674                
;;;675                info_set = set_51;
;;;676                break;
;;;677            }
;;;678            case set_53:
;;;679            {
;;;680                hItem = WM_GetDialogItem(hWinsysinfo, ID_TEXT_104);
00001e  f6400a9e          MOV      r10,#0x89e
;;;681                TEXT_SetBkColor(hItem,GUI_INVALID_COLOR);
;;;682                TEXT_SetTextColor(hItem, 0x00BFFFFF);
;;;683

                  |L8.1040|
                          DCD      0x00bfffff
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i._cbDialog||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          REQUIRE _printf_pre_padding
                          REQUIRE _printf_percent
                          REQUIRE _printf_widthprec
                          REQUIRE _printf_d
                          REQUIRE _printf_int_dec
                  _cbDialog PROC
;;;142    */
;;;143    static void _cbDialog(WM_MESSAGE * pMsg) {
000000  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
000004  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;144        WM_HWIN hItem;
;;;145        static char buf[5];
;;;146    
;;;147    
;;;148        
;;;149      
;;;150      // USER START (Optionally insert additional variables)
;;;151      // USER END
;;;152    
;;;153      switch (pMsg->MsgId) {
;;;154    		
;;;155    	case WM_PAINT:
;;;156            GUI_SetColor(GUI_WHITE);//ʨ׃ۭҊҕɫ
;;;157            GUI_FillRect(0,25,480,26);//ۭһ͵ʵП
;;;158            GUI_SetColor(GUI_ORANGE);
;;;159            GUI_SetFont(&GUI_Fontsymbol);
;;;160            GUI_UC_SetEncodeUTF8();
;;;161            GUI_SetTextMode(GUI_TM_TRANS);//ʨ׃τѾģʽΪ֗ɫ͸ķ
;;;162            GUI_DispStringAt("Jinko", 5, 1);//SET
;;;163            if(lang == 0)
;;;164            {  
;;;165                GUI_SetColor(GUI_WHITE);

                  |L9.1708|
                          DCD      GUI_Font24_1
                  |L9.1712|
                          DCD      ||.data||+0x1c

                          AREA ||.constdata||, DATA, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  _aDialogCreate7
                          DCD      WINDOW_CreateIndirect
                          DCD      ||.conststring||
000008  08980000          DCW      0x0898,0x0000
00000c  000001e0          DCW      0x0000,0x01e0
000010  01100000          DCW      0x0110,0x0000
                          DCD      0x00000000
                          DCD      0x00000000
                          DCD      TEXT_CreateIndirect
                          DCD      ||.conststring||+0x8
000024  089900b4          DCW      0x0899,0x00b4

                          DCD      0x00000000
                          DCD      0x00000000
                          DCD      TEXT_CreateIndirect
